thread.title: Singapore clinches nine spots at Asia's 50 Best Restaurants 2017
thread.title_full: Singapore clinches nine spots at Asia's 50 Best Restaurants 2017

author: Staff Writer
title: Singapore clinches nine spots at Asia's 50 Best Restaurants 2017
text:
Share By Nicole-Marie Ng Posted: Wednesday February 22 2017, 3:33pm 
The results are in: Singapore now has nine of Asia's 50 Best Restaurants. Restaurant André by chef André Chiang climbed one spot and now ranks second, behind Gaggan in Bangkok. 
Odette 
Odette joins the list at number nine, winning the Highest New Entry Award 2017. Chef Dave Pynt of Burnt Ends also makes us proud by clinching the 10th spot and taking home the coveted Chefs' Choice Award 2017. Other Singapore restaurants on this year's list include Les Amis (16), Waku Ghin (20), Corner House (23), Tippling Club (27), Jaan (42) and Shinji by Kanesaka (44).
